item.title: The Package Manager for Windows [ Chocolatey ]
item.description: Introduction Do you ever thought about a single command to install, uninstall or update softwares in Windows? How about a script automatically do everything for you? Guess what, you’re in the perfect place! Chocolatey is a package manager for Windows, which you can install by a single command and do everything with a single command! Showcase Install softwares > choco install vlc Updated softwares > choco upgrade vlc Uninstall softwares
